name: crm-intelligence
description: CRM Intelligence Platform with AI-powered chat and MCP server

scripts.build: cd mcp-server && npm run build && cd ../web-client && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd mcp-server && npm run dev" "cd web-client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd mcp-server && npm install && cd ../web-client && npm install
